param.name: uuid
param.doc: unique id of the interface to update

ContentType:application/json { "name" : "Private", "comment" : "", "enabled" : true, "vlanId" : null, "bondingMode": "none", "bondedTo": "", "ipv4" : { "dhcp" : { "enabled" : false, "allowManagement" : false, "providesDefaultRoute": false }, "addresses" : [{ "uuid" : "1e107d3b-0748-4e02-96f7-581cb8655356", "objType" : "ipv4Address", "address" : "10.0.254.1", "maskOrPrefix" : "24", "broadcastAddress": null, "allowManagement" : false, "isPrimary" : false, "enabled" : true }] }, "ipv6" : { "dhcp" : { "enabled" : false, "allowManagement" : false }, "addresses" : [] }
} Example: Updating additional 192.168.182.12 address curl -s -k --user admin:admin -X PUT --data @if.txt -H 'Accept: application/json' https://lmi.example.com/net/ifaces/b3ed3b81-2d84-44d0-8a7e-5b74cf65fae5 if.txt contents {"ipv4": {"dhcp":{"enabled":false,"allowManagement":false,"providesDefaultRoute":false,"routeMetric":null}, "addresses":[{"address":"192.168.182.11","maskOrPrefix":"24","broadcastAddress":null,"allowManagement":false,"isPrimary":false,"enabled":true,"uuid":"74a948f6-fb48-4466-895f-364bc89e5003","objType":"ipv4Address"}, {"address":"192.168.182.12","maskOrPrefix":"24","broadcastAddress":null,"allowManagement":false,"isPrimary":false,"enabled":true,"uuid":"5b0c6a44-56a4-4af1-86a5-ed1aac2e6ca1","objType":"ipv4Address"}]}, "ipv6": {"dhcp":{"enabled":true,"allowManagement":false}, "addresses":[]},"name":"","label":"1.2","enabled":true,"type":"physical", "vlanId":null,"bondingMode":"none","bondedTo":"","uuid":"b3ed3b81-2d84-44d0-8a7e-5b74cf65fae5","objType":"interface","comment":""}

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: ContentType:application/json
param.doc: Request is in JSON formatting

param.name: name
param.doc: name of the object.

param.name: comment
param.doc: comment to identify the interface object.

param.name: enabled
param.doc: true if the interface should be used, otherwise false.

param.name: vlanId
param.doc: vlan id of interface in range "0".."4094". Required for Vlan Interfaces.

param.name: bondingMode
param.doc: none|slave|balance-rr|active-backup|balance-xor|broadcast|802.3ad|balance-tlb|balance-alb. Defaults to none if not provided. Do not provide for vlan or loopback interfaces.

param.name: bondedTo
param.doc: Only required if bondingMode == 'slave'. Set to UUID of interface bonded to.

param.name: ipv4
param.doc: ipv4 configuration of the interface

param.name: ipv6
param.doc: ipv6 configuration of the interface

param.name: dhcp
param.doc: dhcp configuration details. Do not provide for loopback interfaces.

param.name: addresses
param.doc: static address configuration details.

param.name: overrideSubnetChecking
param.doc: true to indicate that the check for overlapping subnets should not be executed. The default value of false is used if this data is not supplied.

param.name: dhcp
param.doc: dhcp configuration details. Do not provide for loopback interfaces.

param.name: addresses
param.doc: static address configuration details.

param.name: enabled
param.doc: true to use dhcp to configure the interface, otherwise false.

param.name: allowManagement
param.doc: true to allow management access on the dhcp interface.

param.name: providesDefaultRoute
param.doc: true if the dhcp configuration should specify a default route.

param.name: routeMetric
param.doc: optional default route metric if providesDefaultRoute is true.

param.name: uuid
param.doc: unique id of the object, null, for new

param.name: address
param.doc: address value.

param.name: objType
param.doc: type of the object (always "ipv4Address").

param.name: maskOrPrefix
param.doc: subnet mask or prefix. e.g. "255.255.255.0", "24".

param.name: broadcastAddress
param.doc: broadcast address on the subnet.

param.name: allowManagement
param.doc: true to allow management access on this address.

param.name: isPrimary
param.doc: true if this is the primary management address.

param.name: enabled
param.doc: true to enabled this address, otherwise false.

param.doc: true to use dhcp to configure the interface, otherwise false.
